description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the identified issues in Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) as specified in CVE-2024-20709:

1. Download the update package corresponding to your build number from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Apply the KB20709 update to ensure that your Microsoft Edge is patched to version 120.0.2210.133 or later.
3. Restart Microsoft Edge after installation to activate the update effectively.

**Details**:
- This update is intended to resolve a security concern impacting the Chromium-based Microsoft Edge. It is essential to ensure that you are running one of the specified build numbers (120.0.2210.133 or 120.0.2336.0) prior to applying the KB20709 update.
- For more details on the update, visit: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB20709.
